document_data.name: Aman Al-Raqib
document_data.mainbody: '''Aman Al-Raqib''' was astrologer and advisor to Hetmann [[Alham Pasha Burak]]. He sought adventurers to fulfill [[Martek]]'s prophecy.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|13}}
document_data.Description: The man had thinning hair, flaring eyebrows, and wore robes, with a pouch at his belt.
document_data.Personality: Aman was more than willing to share what he knew about the prophecies and legends of Martek, as well as rumors he knew.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|15-16}}
document_data.Activities: Aman was looking for adventurers to find the Star Gems of Martek and acquire his Sphere of Power.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|11}}
document_data.Relationships: He was astrologer, advisor, and friends with Hetmann Alham Pasha.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|15}} A mute giant, [[Fuigarm]], was his bodyguard.
